name: The Three Mazeketeers
description:
A girl was summoned by a certain kingdom from a magical place to help the kingdom with a daunting task. But the summoner accidentally summoned three version of the girl from different timelines to one body! Would they be able to finish the task?

Help these girls to finish the task by journeying through the labyrinth. Use different forms to see different perspective and to tackle various challenge. What lies beyond the labyrinth?

[Heads up! The game is still on prototype. Things might be buggy, or the mechanic is still simple. We're trying to show what will be in the game, but things might change later.]

Features

> 3 Forms to see the world differently

> Each form has their unique abilities to tackle different challenges

> First challenges will be simple, but the later one will need player to utilize all of the different forms
